CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 24, 1959, pg. A16 reads: "Third Anniversary Celebration - Some members of the family and several intimate friends were on hand, last week, to help Mr. and Mrs. Charles Thompson of 611 Larimer Ave., East Liberty, celebrate their third wedding anniversary. it was a delightful occasion for the happy couple and guests.  The Courier photographer took this picture during a pause in festivities.  Left to right: Mrs. Thompson and daughter, Magnolia Smith.  Back row: Constable Thomas J. Smith, brother of Mrs. Thompson, and Mrs. Thompson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Mr. and Mrs. Charles Thompson, posed with daughter, Magnolia Smith in Thompson home at 611 Larimer Avenue, East Liberty, for third wedding anniversary
